thread.title: anastasios sofroniou
thread.title_full: Graffitishop recensione scritta da anastasios sofroniou

author: anastasios sofroniou
title: anastasios sofroniou
text: Hey guys, just got my new leather Vans shoes , 2 days earlier than scheduled which is really handy as I m off to a business trip tomorrow, great service with e mails about the progress of my order throughout and a 10% discount voucher for my next purchase ..If instead of 2 weeks free standard delivery you could narrow it down to 1 week then you would be even more cool ..Overall very happy well done
